text: Five Things Jesus Did Not Say Preparing audio to download. Sponsored listening. Audio will begin within seconds... Escucha sin anuncios y sin esperas con iVoox Premium [Try it for free](https://www.ivoox.com/premium) Preparing audio to download. Sponsored listening. Audio will begin within seconds... Escucha sin anuncios y sin esperas con iVoox Premium By Dan Apartian in Central Illinois - December 16, 2023 - We live in a world where technological advances enable modern concepts and philosophies for how to improve the quality of our lives to quickly spread around the world as wisdom and absolute truths. But the contrasting truth is IF you're looking for true absolute wisdom worth to guide your lives, it can only be found in the Word of God and the core of that instruction was given directly by Jesus Christ, the Son of God. This sermon contrasts 5 common philosophies today to what Jesus actually advised.
